Body:
Just to be on the safe side, please CORRECT me if I am wrong.
When RPL is in storing mode, each node knows its direct children and via which child a given node can be accessed. E.g., the following topology 

7-6-5-1-2-3-4 	  | |     |	  8 10    9

If the node No 1 wants to send a msg to node 7, it will send it to 5 without knowing where exactly No 7 is. Node No 5 will send it to No 6 who knows that it is directly" connected to 7. On the other hand
column9: if No 1 wants to send a msg to No 4
column10: it will send it to No 2
column11:
who knows that No 4 is accessible via No 3.

"
